actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that receipt of disability compensation for dependents not depend upon the waiver of receipt of an equal amount of retired pay.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' disability compensation provisions to provide that the receipt of additional compensation for dependents does not require the waiver of an equal amount of retired or retirement pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that receipt of disability compensation for dependents not depend upon the waiver of receipt of an equal amount of retired pay.
